H0.text: In January 1971, Idi Amin deposed Milton Obote in a coup to become President of which country. Kenya

H1.text: In January 1971, Idi Amin deposed Milton Obote in a coup to become President of which country. Tanzania

H2.text: In January 1971, Idi Amin deposed Milton Obote in a coup to become President of which country. Zambia

H3.text: In January 1971, Idi Amin deposed Milton Obote in a coup to become President of which country. Uganda

A4.text: Amin launched the 1971 Ugandan coup d'Ã©tat and declared himself president.

A5.text: On 2 February 1971, one week after the coup, Amin declared himself President of Uganda.
